Category:Template Documentation1415431q4u3jqajscqqvlus6oipei59f0nho57838992013-04-27T18:18:48Z94.172.224.97something important, the wiki needs.The documentation of the templates must be placed in the subpage ''<template>''/doc. Then add <code><nowiki><noinclude>{{Documentation}}</noinclude></nowiki></code> after the template code, in the template page.

:''See also: [[Template:Documentation|Documentation]]''
